name: content_calendar
description: Create structured content production schedules with specific topics and formats
command: mirador chain content_creator task_planner "Create a 90-day content calendar for [NICHE/TOPIC] with specific themes, topics, and formats for each week"
notes: This chain specializes in tactical content planning. The content_creator develops the creative direction while the task_planner organizes it into an actionable production schedule. Particularly useful for maintaining consistent publishing cadence.
